recipe.title: White Beans with Tasso
ingredients: 12 ounces dried Great Northern beans (about 1 3/4 cups), rinsed
1 1/2 ounces tasso* or andouille sausage, finely diced (generous 1/3 cup)
instructions: Stir 3 1/4 cups water and all remaining ingredients in large slow cooker. Cover and cook on high until beans are tender, stirring occasionally and adding more water if dry, about 4 1/2 hours. Remove ham hock. Cut off all meat; shred and return to beans. Season to taste with salt and pepper.

Stir 3 1/4 cups water and all remaining ingredients in large slow cooker. Cover and cook on high until beans are tender, stirring occasionally and adding more water if dry, about 4 1/2 hours. Remove ham hock. Cut off all meat; shred and return to beans. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
